about_the_game:
In Harry's Adventure, you play as Harry the Hare, whose girlfriend has gone missing.

Experience a thrilling retro platforming adventure that will take you through green fields, dark woods, magical mushroom forests, enchanted wizard towers, and even to the moon!

In the single-player story mode you will experience:
  • Fast, physics-based movement with precise platforming controls!
  • Many enemy varieties - flying, walking, swooping, shooting, leaping, and more!
  • Dig your way through hidden burrows to find alternate paths and hidden stage exits!
  • Find and eat a variety of vegetables that grant gameplay-altering power ups!
  • Fun platforming elements like boost pads, icy and muddy ground, portals, and more!

Or hop online for the thrilling multi-player experience, which has multiple stage options and supports up to 100 players per lobby!
Duke it out with your friends in team-based modes like Capture the Flag and Team Deathmatch,
or go berzerk in the free-for-all mode where it's all about being the last hare standing!
